metadata.name: Curse Shenanigans
metadata.description:
This mod requires REPENTOGON. Press the tilde key to open the new debug console and menu. There's a new Shenanigans option that will let you toggle curses.
This is not a curse manager. It won't set curses at the start of a floor. It simply lets you play around with curses for debugging purposes.
Modded curses and StageApi stages are supported.
